appDesc.message: Job offer qualifier for sought software engineers

missingUrl.message: Your profile URL is missing. Please open the Settings page and enter your URL. If you don't know the URL, you can find it by visiting your Equalizer profile page.

missingUrlMessageChecker.message: Your profile URL is missing. Please enter your URL on the settings page.

missingUrlSettingsPage.message: Your profile URL is missing. Please click on the edit icon and enter your URL. If you don't know the URL, you can find it by visiting your Equalizer profile page.

insertUrlInfo.message: Use #URL# to insert your profile URL.

autoReplyText.message:
Checks whether your unread messages are job-related or not and send an automatic reply on your behalf. 

 Utilizes artificial intelligence. (Open AI)

linkedinMessageText.message: You also have the option to manually paste your 'Reply message' by clicking on the Equalizer icon below the message input.   Utilizes human intelligence. (That's you :P)

extensionFeaturesText.message: From the extensions menu, you can also copy your "Equalizer URL" or "Reply message" wherever you are on the web.

openAiDescription.message: Here you can enable OpenAI to utilize our AI assistant that sends automated responses to inquiries related to job opportunity on LinkedIn. It disregards any messages on other topics.

howToOpenAi.message: How to get your own OpenAI key?

emptyProfileUrlError.message: The profile URL cannot be empty!

emptyMessageError.message: The automatic reply cannot be empty!

emptyApiKeyError.message: The OpenAI API key cannot be empty!

incorrectApiKeyError.message: The OpenAI API key you provided is not valid.
